originalText.text: i am a junior in Mott hall high school i am apart of the national honor society  and the volleyball team i believe this school has made a big improvement since i fist came in freshmen year they are always on top of the students making sure they get to class and are doing their work. if a student is behind on work or is not doing so good they offer tutoring Monday-Thursday and Saturdays. other than tutoring the school offers a variety of sports and clubs  for example we have volleyball,baseball,soccer,basketball,bat mitten,golf , and a crochet club and if you do not like any of those if you get enough people you can start your own club like with volleyball when we first came in their was no team  but a lot of girls were interested in playing so we talked to the assistant principal and he made it happen he is now our couch overall Mott hall high school is getting better and i think its a good school.

originalText.text: As a student at Mott Hall Highschool there's many things that have got better. Like the performance of the students and what's actually going on in the school. Many things are being added to this school for the students to advantage of like the National Honors Society, Teams, Clubs, and after school tutoring. Also as long as the students works well with the teachers the teachers are able to help the students in what ever they need. There's also many programs our school have taken part in so we are prepared for college and are college ready when it comes to our senior year.

originalText.text: I am junior at Mott Hall High School, and I believe that the school has made great improvements. I am part of the girls volleyball team and also part of the national honor society. Mott Hall High school has also given us many clubs that the student can attend to such as crochet and bat mitten ,softball team, basketball team for boys and girls, baseball, golf and soccer. The staff is also very hardworking they make sure that all the students attend their classes. The staff as well recompenses those students who have had perfect attendance and that were in the honor roll for the marking period with a movie night or a different activity for our accomplishments. Mott Hall High School has also offered me tutoring which is after school. I've had the opportunity to study for my exams and regents with my teachers, which include classes such as Math, Science, Social studies and English. Also Mott Hall provides students of the 11th and 12th grade to experience college by giving us the option to attend college courses.Overall, Mott Hall High School has been an amazing school with good opportunities that would prepare us for the future.

originalText.text: Mott Hall High School is a good place to get you ready for the next chapter in life which is college. They offer students to sign up for College Now Classes at John Jay or Monroe College to earn college credits but also offer SEO for students to get a step higher towards success.

originalText.text: This school has improved a lot from recent years, their is new counselors and better staff. They helped us a lot with college and gave us many opportunities like a full ride with Monroe college.
